overview: Xiao Lang is the daughter of a Chinese millionaire, she is flying from London to Guangzhou for her own wedding. The plane makes an emergency landing in Moscow. To make it to the ceremony in time and to catch the next flight to Guangzhou, Xiao Lang has to exit into the city, which she believes to be barbarous. During the next day, she is destined to live through the most wonderful adventures. Xiao Lang not only gets to know the real Moscow, but also meets a person who might be worth staying here for…
title: Ni Hao, Moscow
